description:
archive/zip: hide Write method from *Writer type

This was an implementation detail that snuck into the public interface.
*Writer.Create gives you an io.Writer, the *Writer itself was never
meant to be written to.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=792c7561af4b ***

archive/zip: hide Write method from *Writer type

This was an implementation detail that snuck into the public interface.
*Writer.Create gives you an io.Writer, the *Writer itself was never
meant to be written to.

R=golang-dev, dsymonds, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5654076

subject: code review 5654076: archive/zip: hide Write method from *Writer type
